text_block_list.text: An entire day had passed since the "Audience" with Orfevre——

I presented Orfevre with the 
『Improvement Training Plan』 she had requested.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ………So it's only to this level.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
It's too orthodox. It won't be useful like this. 
Revise it immediately. In a manner befitting of me.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
A foolish question. 
——Would you prefer a delicate king who can only sit on their throne?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Even if the heaven and earth are torn asunder, 
I will tread my own path, and obtain all that I desire——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
A true "King" is one who transcends all. 
Radiance is what follows one who breaks through those clouded skies.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Thus it falls to you to offer such a path to the "King". 
One filled with every imaginable hardship. And then——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——The one to effortlessly overcome them all, will be me.

She was able to help me change my perspective. Her desire for 
strength was much more intense and genuine than I imagined.
choice_data_list: I'll fix it. Give me 10 minutes…!
I'll fix it. Give me 10 minutes…!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
——………Good work. 
An acceptable speed of revision. We will use this as a basis.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Now, I shall prepare. 
The ones following this will be them, you will direct them.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal B
text_block_list.text:
Orfevre-sama! 
A change of clothing has been prepared for you!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Umu.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san. While the "King" is preparing, 
please instruct us on the training contents.

In this way, Orfevre's training would be supported 
by the Uma Musume that were her vassals——

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
——Thank you for your hard work. 
A towel and water have been prepared.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Good work.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal B
text_block_list.text:
The training will now move on to the dirt course! 
I will guide you.

Due to the efforts of her vassals, 
the training progressed smoothly. However——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: If you have something to say, then say it.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. ……I am a "King". 
One whose splendor cannot be suppressed, even by the heavens.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
As such, to bask in that radiance, it is natural for vassals to gather. 
……It is only logical.

Orfevre earnestly continued her rigorous training. 
At the end, she proposed a mock race to evaluate today's results——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
——Explain your strategy to my vassals. 
Proceed, with the intention to defeat me.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
You too, must muster all of your strength. 
Strike at the "King" to your heart's content.

text_block_list.name: Vassals
text_block_list.text: Yes!!

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text: ——Orfevre-sama, excuse me for obstructing!

Following my instructions, Orfevre's vassals moved to 
block her path. There was no hesitation in their movements.

Orfevre's speed and power were overwhelming. However, there 
would be times when she could not fully utilize that strength——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
————Good. 
As to be expected from my vassals.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal B
text_block_list.text: !? The "King" is falling back……!?

Orfevre suddenly lowered her pace. She was falling back 
to get a good look at the "wall" in front of her……!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ————Ooooooooh!!!

Orfevre accelerates, as if to clear the "wall" from the 
outside. Her run was strong, an unwavering ray of light——

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ——Everyone, good work. It was quite worthwhile.

Orfevre drastically improved her coursework today. 
I was excited by her incredible growth rate——

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
As expected of Orfevre-sama……! To think you could run 
like that too, I was able to learn something today……!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Your spirit was quite difficult to break. 
For my sake, keep that fighting spirit.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal A
text_block_list.text:
I don't deserve such praise……! That honor is 
too much for me! ——Just as the "King", I too 
will obtain results in the next Selection Race……!

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal B
text_block_list.text:
My "King"……! 
Thank you for showing me what I am lacking!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
Then it was fruitful. With those eyes that were first 
to behold my run, continue to sharpen those skill.

text_block_list.name: Orfe's Vassal B
text_block_list.text:
Yes! We will break through our winless 
records and aim for greater heights.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
——All of you, continue to strive forth. All of that strength 
that you cultivate will also become the root of my own.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
And then I will prove it. A true "King" is one 
that turns all obstacles to dust and reigns supreme.

……She was not someone defined by talent alone. She is a "King" 
because she yearns for greater heights than anyone else.

And those dazzled by the sight of her aiming for such 
heights……can't help but dream and aspire to it too.

Orfevre would live up to that admiration without fail. 
Because that is what it means to be "King".
choice_data_list: (I want to see it. This "King's" reign——)

text_block_list.text:
That strong emotion welled within me. 
I want……to become the "King's" strength too.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: ………What is it?
choice_data_list: I… want to form a contract!!
I… want to form a contract!!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
………—— 
……The you right now does not have that qualification.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I said it already. The one that will be selecting is this "King". 
……If it's just admiration, then anyone can do it.
……My faint hopes that 『I could be chosen』 were crushed instantly.

————However, I won't give up. It was already burned in to my eyes. 
The once-in-a-lifetime radiance of the Uma Musume known as Orfevre.

Just what kind of person would a "King" choose? 
What is it that I am currently lacking?
